DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether cancer that has spread from the organ in which it first appeared to that portion of the body that lies between the thorax and the pelvis.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to cancer that has spread from the organ in which it first appeared to that portion of the body that lies between the thorax and the pelvis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (AB-do-men) The area of the body that contains the pancreas, stomach, intestine, liver, gallbladder, and other organs.

Concepts.definition: The cavity located between the lungs and pelvis. It contains the lower esophagus, stomach, pancreas, intestines, liver, gallbladder and spleen.

Property.preferredDefinition: Cancer that has spread from the organ in which it first appeared to another organ. For example, breast cancer cells may spread (metastasize) to the lungs and cause the growth of a new tumor. When this happens, the disease is called metastatic breast cancer.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: The spread or migration of cancer cells from one part of the body (the organ in which it first appeared) to another. The secondary tumor contains cells that are like those in the original (primary) tumor.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Were there any isolated dista
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were there any isolated distant or non-contiguous intra-abdominal mets (other than peri-rectal lymph node involvement)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description:
Were there any isolated, distant, or non-contiguous intra-abdominal metastases (other than
regional lymph nodes)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were other non-contiguous intra-abdominal tumors found?
